alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 9:57AM PST until November 30 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON FOR LADD AND PYLES CANYONS... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph for Ladd and Pyles Canyons. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Strong crosswinds can be expected along interstate 84 including Cabbage Hill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
